website_summaries.verdict: A quality paint that provides durable coverage with just one coat.
pros: Paint has a matte finish that’s durable and mildew resistant
Available in a gorgeous range of warm colors
Provides quality coverage with one coat
Dries smooth even on textured walls
Adheres well to surfaces such as coated or uncoated wood, drywall, masonry and cured plaster
cons: Some complaints that the paint colors don't perfectly match the online swatches

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a good buy
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is beyond amazing. This was my first time painting an entire room. I didn’t even use half the can. It only took one coat. I’m super impressed, when we do the other rooms in our house I will definitely be purchasing from this brand. We have textured walls which I don’t like so I read that this matte paint would be best, and it is, unless you’re really looking, the walls don’t look as textured as they did before, which is what I was hoping.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color
customer_reviews.text: Perfect paint--not too thick or thin. Went on very easily and looks great. Used it for an entryway to brighten up the space. A pale pink--not overwhelming at all. As a first time painter, I really had no idea what I was doing. One thing I learned (from the Internet) is to be very careful with the rollers/brushes used as that can impact the way the paint looks on your wall. Go with quality rollers. Anyway, I'm super happy I chose this color and this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Alic

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE JUST GO TO YOUR LOCAL PAINT STORES
customer_reviews.text: PURCHASED THIS OCT 2cd ....It's OCT 6th nobody can tell me any information about the tracking or have responded to my questions...I'm VERY VERY VERY disappointed because I could've just went to my local LOWE'S and got some paint ...I needed this paint before my new furniture came That's why I paid for rushed shipping and its about to be 2 weeks! To receive some paint!??? And NOBODY even USPS has said their is no shipping or tracking information on this item I WILL NEVER BUY FROM THIS MANUFACTURE AGAIN THIS IS RIDICULOUS and waste of time and money BEWARE!!!
customer_reviews.author: 𝓖𝓮𝓶𝓲𝓷𝓲🥀

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate color
customer_reviews.text: Ended up looking neon on pre primed wall. Very transparent. Took three coats and still not “Golden” like description. More greenish.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Color not right
customer_reviews.text: Great paint BUT the ivory porcelain is white. Not the light cream color I expected. Color not as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Paint doesn’t match swatch.
customer_reviews.text: I got the peel-and-stick swatch and loved the color. Bought an 8 oz sample just to make sure. I’m glad I did, because the color of the actual paint does not match the swatch. Much brighter. I would have been very unhappy if I had spent $50 on a full gallon.
customer_reviews.author: Starshine Stanfield

customer_reviews.title: Very nice coverage, great paint choice
customer_reviews.text: This product goes on great without a primer and doesn’t leave brush streaks. Smooth and seamless color all over instead of different shades in areas painted at different times.
customer_reviews.author: January MH

customer_reviews.title: Color is different than what is pictured
customer_reviews.text: The color ended up looking like a tomato bisque instead of a terra-cotta. I ended up mixing it with the white paint I had and did get a nice peachy-clay color (see photo of door). But especially if you are going to be painting a wall or something large, be aware of that.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge

customer_reviews.title: Better than traditional paint samples
customer_reviews.text: It’s a peel and stick paint sample. You can see how it looks in any room without worrying about a having a random paint patch on your wall. Doesn’t damage the walls when you move it.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin D

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: These are not the size of normal paint samples, they're tiny! I was expecting an pint, the way paint samples usually come. Very, very small. About 1⁄4 the size you'd expect. Not enough product for the money. It's just not worth it. I'm very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: John Smith & LØ

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Pictures speak for themselves. 2 cans, totally unusable. Took way too long to receive as well.
customer_reviews.author: Gracie C.

customer_reviews.title: Good to cover some cracked wall paint
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to cover some torn/cracked wall paint and it blends in with the original cover quite well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for touch ups!
customer_reviews.text: This paint is awesome! A renter’s friend!! The little scuffs and peels are gone. Use a sponge brush and pressed the paint into any gash and watch it disappear. This is one way to get your security deposit back!
customer_reviews.author: Archie D.

customer_reviews.title: So thin
customer_reviews.text: Very thin. Took MULTIPLE coats of paint before I couldn’t see the wall underneath. I think about 4 coats in total and then a final coat where as other paints take maybe two. My project took me 4 days longer than it should have. Maybe it is just my walls but for the price I should have just gone to the hardware store.
customer_reviews.author: Kali fields

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: I love the color. It's very true to the on-line example. I did put on 2 coats, so don't expect single coat coverage, but once it dries it looks great. This was used on a vintage travel trailer wall over wood veneer.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Barkin

customer_reviews.title: Not the same as picture
customer_reviews.text: Not as dark as the picture! I'm looking for this to be almost black!!! Have looked almost everywhere!Was only a super dark eggplant in the 80's.
customer_reviews.author: Katy Neiman

customer_reviews.title: This is a really nice "sunny" yellow
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice "sunny" yellow. I bought a sample size [8 oz] and used it to paint some vases for my indoor garden. They turned out great.
customer_reviews.author: Lilith

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: Color jusy ask picture i got the semi gloss pain look really good quality abd product fast dry and no strong order plus it dry so quci you dont really has to worry about smell
customer_reviews.author: Ari

customer_reviews.title: One of the best paints I have used to sample
customer_reviews.text: Paint is exactly as advertised and it goes on well and if you spill it then it comes right up with nail polish remover. Also cleans off well on your skin.
customer_reviews.author: Maria D.

customer_reviews.title: Completely different color
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY! Worst product ordered angelic pink and what I got is like off white!! It’s supposed to be mixed with primer there’s no way! Barley covered! Waste of 50 not sure if they shipped the wrong color or if that actually what it is HIGHLY dissatisfied
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great value and qulaity, but color on the site is not the exact color in the can. My yellow was lighter than the color on the can.
customer_reviews.author: marie

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage and pretty color!
customer_reviews.text: Was just the color I was looking for! The price is comparable to big box store samples. It went on well and easily and has a nice coverage.
customer_reviews.author: AubKov

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for bedroom
customer_reviews.text: One of the best light pinks that I’ve found so far. I purchased the satin finish and it looks great. I’m going to buy the gallon and hopefully it coats well. The satin finish makes it hard to clean with a damp cloth when dusting walls but a dry duster would be best to do this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Needs better shipping package.
customer_reviews.text: 2 out of 3 paints were busted and leaked out. I would recommend the company to pack them better. Colors look spot on to what I wanted so I’m pleased there. I will just make do with what I have.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Marie Gray

customer_reviews.title: Truly one coat
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite interior paint so far, but watch out because it won’t come out of carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Allyson Schlegel

customer_reviews.title: Great quality but color differs
customer_reviews.text: Love the paint. The color is not as pictured though. Did not work for me in my Theme.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: 😍😍😍
customer_reviews.text: Color was perfect for my pantry remodel, and the coverage is spectacular!
customer_reviews.author: Remybuxaplenty

customer_reviews.title: Color Sample Swatches
customer_reviews.text: I loved the way it let me put them on the wall so I can see what the color looks like on my wall. They're great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Semi gloss looks like our shine
customer_reviews.text: Love the coverage and color of this paint! So glad i chose it!
customer_reviews.author: barbara roth

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I like the size and that I was able to put it on the wall easily..
customer_reviews.author: Sheila McKenzie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous color!!!!’ If you’re looking fir a yellow this one is very very pretty!!!’ Not too bright.
customer_reviews.author: Dee C.

customer_reviews.title: Est paint sample anywhere
customer_reviews.text: Loved the sample quality and size. It self adheres to the wall without causing damage.
customer_reviews.author: Mycloud9

customer_reviews.title: Paint Sample
customer_reviews.text: The Self Stick Paint Sample Was Right Color and and Came 1 day service Thank you so much for the cool sample 😊
customer_reviews.author: Darrin McGuire

customer_reviews.title: Lovely shade
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, delicate shade of pink. Great paint. One coat coverage .
customer_reviews.author: EARS Endangered Animal Rescue Sanctuary

customer_reviews.title: Very Rare
customer_reviews.text: What is so rare these days is to get something that meets its purpose. Looks just like the color on the screen.
customer_reviews.author: frozenpart2

customer_reviews.title: Great paint
customer_reviews.text: Love the color, the easy coat, the depth of the color. I’ve bought two more gallon for other rooms in my home. Great paint.
customer_reviews.author: kristinaperez

customer_reviews.title: Not the color advertised
customer_reviews.text: Changed color as soon as I stirred it. Color advertised on cap, mixed color in tray. Supposed to be *Angelic Pink* but looks more like cream.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but smells of strong ammonia.
customer_reviews.text: Nice rich paint, but glad I just got a sample - has a strong smell of ammonia.
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color
customer_reviews.text: Love love love! Color is beautiful and exactly what I hoped for in my nursery. Painted it myself (I did two coats of paint 24 hours apart) and can’t say enough how much I love the result. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Got it for free
customer_reviews.text: Came wrinkled and wouldn’t come off once on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Letxy

customer_reviews.title: Free Sample
customer_reviews.text: I recieved this as a free sample & was very happy with it. I would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Blue red FABULOUS one-coat remedy for scratched furniture
customer_reviews.text: These sample sizes were a very good introduction to theis relatively new KILZ product. Easy to apply evenly.
customer_reviews.author: P. Breneman

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: My sample was busted open when I received it, it looked like it was packaged well. I’m not sure what happened.
customer_reviews.author: sametra a. murrell-reid

customer_reviews.title: Great sticky paint pieces
customer_reviews.text: The color is great. The quality of the paper is thick.
customer_reviews.author: Janessa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This product is Excellent. I'm now thinking about getting the paint in white.
customer_reviews.author: Suzy-Q

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful highly pigmented paint.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic! Rich color that sets as smooth as can be. Dries quickly. I love this paint.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s a sample size color sheet. Worked well for a background on a small project.
customer_reviews.text: Decent product. A little smaller than I thought it would be but worked great for a small project I was doing.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany D

customer_reviews.title: Waste of product.
customer_reviews.text: Received the paint spilt all over the plastic bag/box it came in. Due to amount of spillage, needed to purchase additional paint from other retailer. Only reason I gave 2 stars is because the color is accurately portrayed in the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: these paint samples are great
customer_reviews.text: i loved this color crimson it looked amazing on my bedroom wall,so i will painting my room this color if my landlord will let me..
customer_reviews.author: Jessica G.

customer_reviews.title: Product was very well received
customer_reviews.text: This was very easy to install and the color was very colorful and easy to be cleaned
customer_reviews.author: linda mazzella

customer_reviews.title: Quick & accurate
customer_reviews.text: Very fast shipping! It was just as expected. The color is amazing. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

product_meta.title: KILZ TRIBUTE Interior Matte Paint and Primer in One, 1 Gallon, Haute Red (TB-97)
product_meta.description: Color:17-Haute Red (TB-97)| Size Name:1 Gallon, MatteKILZ TRIBUTE Matte is a low VOC, 100% acrylic advanced technology paint and primer in one formulated for superior hide and coverage with exceptional durability and a mildew-resistant finish. Matte sheen offers a subtle, flat finish and resists dirt with a scrubbable film for easy cleaning. Paint-primer in one is ideal for light to dark color changes and covering light to medium stains. Haute Red is a fiery cranberry red. Use it to add flair to a gray-schemed living room, kitchen, formal dining room or bathroom cabinetry. KILZ TRIBUTE Paint comes in four sheens and 100 classic neutrals and on trend colors. Our low-VOC durable and washable long-lasting paints will beautify your home and enhance its livability and value. 1-Gallon can of KILZ TRIBUTE Matte Haute Red TB-97 Interior Paint for use with high-quality brushes or rollers. Up to 400 sq. ft. per gallon coverage on smooth surfaces. Use on properly prepared coated or uncoated wood, drywall, masonry and cured plaster. Surfaces should be clean and free of dust, grease, chalk, mold, rust and peeling paint. Mix well before using. KILZ has been making premium primers and paints for 40 years and leverage this experience in every gallon of KILZ Paint. Named Paint Brand of the Year in 2015 in the Harris Poll EquiTrend Rankings. Lifetime Limited Warranty (see label for details). GREENGUARD Certified: low emissions of VOCs. Color samples are available in 8 oz. containers or removable Peel & Stick sheets.
feature_bullets: KILZ TRIBUTE Matte is a low VOC, 100% acrylic advanced technology paint and primer in one formulated for superior hide and coverage with exceptional durability and a mildew-resistant finish.
Haute Red is a fiery cranberry red. Use it to add flair to a gray-schemed living room, kitchen, formal dining room or bathroom cabinetry.
Matte sheen offers a subtle, flat finish and resists dirt with a scrubbable film for easy cleaning. Paint-primer in one is ideal for light to dark color changes and covering light to medium stains.

KILZ TRIBUTE Paint comes in four sheens and 100 classic neutrals and on trend colors. Our low-VOC durable and washable long-lasting paints will beautify your home and enhance its livability and value.
1-Gallon can of KILZ TRIBUTE Matte Haute Red TB-97 Interior Paint for use with high-quality brushes or rollers. Up to 400 sq. ft. per gallon coverage on smooth surfaces.
Use on properly prepared coated or uncoated wood, drywall, masonry and cured plaster. Surfaces should be clean and free of dust, grease, chalk, mold, rust and peeling paint. Mix well before using.
KILZ has been making premium primers and paints for 40 years and leverage this experience in every gallon of KILZ Paint. Named Paint Brand of the Year in 2015 in the Harris Poll EquiTrend  Rankings.
Lifetime Limited Warranty (see label for details). GREENGUARD Certified: low emissions of VOCs. Color samples are available in 8 oz. containers or removable Peel & Stick sheets.
